name: Infinite Chances
description:
A little game I made for my first ever game jam- Brackeys Game Jam! 

It took me roughly 5 days to make the game, and I'm fairly happy with the results. However, I do believe that with some more time, this could've been even better! (The story of my life)

An enemy boxer killed your friend in a boxing match. So, you go back in time to kill him before he kills your friend. There's a catch though- he's more powerful, faster, and more agile. 

All you have? A Time Machine. 

Once he's done some punches and blocks, simply press "R" to go back in time. You now know what moves he's going to do. Use that against him!

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Left click - Left Block

Right click - Right Block

Left shift - Left punch

Space - Right punch

R - Rewind (keep in mind the more you rewind, the emptier the Rewind Meter becomes.) 

Also this is Windows only sorry because of some ILCPP2 library errors sorry :(
